title: MedFlow: Pharma Microservices Platform
tags: Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kafka, Redis
description: A backend-first microservices platform for pharmacy operations, designed using Java and Spring Boot to handle inventory, orders, and transactional workflows with a strong focus on scalability, reliability, and clean service boundaries.

title: PlaceIt: Placement Integration System
tags: React, Tailwindcss, Django, Neo4jDB, AWS, Jenkins
description: A full-stack system leveraging React, Django, and Neo4jDB to streamline college placement data management, offering automated data handling and real-time student visualization.

title: ShortSnips - DSA Revising Code Snippets
description: An open-source, community-driven platform built with React, Django, and Neo4jDB, providing a centralized resource for revising Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) concepts through code snippets.
